text:
#USpoli #Mueller #MuellerReport #Trump #Russia #TrumpRussia

Bob Mueller's report was submitted on my birthday - how sweet is that?!

Here's the live developments:
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text: I've loved them since their Peter Green blues days to Stevie Nicks & every iteration in between. I could sing every song they've ever written in my sleep. It's a huge one to cross off the list. Only thing I'm really missing now is CSNY & Neil Young solo
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text: Awesome! There's not enough space to type them all for me either! Concert going is my favourite pastime & last year I couldn't attend any due to surgery. This year I'm making up for lost time & I'm ecstatic to add Fleetwood Mac to the list
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text: Yes!! I've been waiting my whole life to see them!! I've seen Roger Waters x2, David Gilmour, Pearl Jam, Sting, Peter Gabriel, John Mayer, Tragically Hip x3, Triumph, Supertramp, Bruce Cockburn, Black Keys, Tame Impala, Alt-J, Jack Johnson, Headstones, AlexisOnFire, Public Enemy
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Got gold tickets to see Fleetwood Mac for my birthday!!

Thank you, thank you, thank you!! That's another one from the bucket list accomplished
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
So the schedule looks like this (mark in calendar)

Jason Bonham - Friday, July 5 (Rama)

John Mayer - Wednesday, July 31 (ACC)

Tesla - Saturday, August 10 (Rama)

Foreigner - Thursday, August 29 (Rama)

All we're missing is Fleetwood Mac & Rolling Stones, of good ones announced
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Sorry if my tweets seem crusty today

I'm actually very happy & you can't hear the cynical laughter that goes with them

On a brighter note, got tix to see John Mayer again + Jason Bonham covering Zeppelin tunes & Foreigner + Tesla for old times sake

It's going be a great summer
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Also today in #CDNmedia news

The federal #budget was tabled but you just cant tell, because the prime minster ate a chocolate bar & THAT was AGAINST THE RULES! #CDNpoli

In moments like these I try to remind myself to be glad of our #FirstWorldProblems & just say no to clickbait
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Today the ominous drum of #CDNmedia beats that a Lib MP resigned from the ruling party to sit as an independent #CDNpoli

"The implications", they shouted!

"A traitor", they shouted!

"The Trudeau govt will fall", they shouted!

But in her own words...
https://twitter.com/MPCelina/status/1108461992036175872 …
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
So the Faculty of Divinity thought it was good to offer Peterson a fellowship, when they believed his extremist incubator was religiously motivated #OntEd

But they rescinded when they learned his apostles were only racist, sexist & homophobic, without God's endorsement? #CDNpoli
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Though I have little respect for Jesse, he's bang-on RE this #CDNmedia bailout

Partisan owners & boards already killed #PressFreedom in #CDNpoli + Supreme Court ruling that we can't protect sources from govt/police warrants

This marks the end of independent journalism entirely
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text: Is there hope that Maclean's will finally be disconnected from its Conservative Party masters & liberated from the propaganda beat? #CDNpoli #CDNmedia
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
With respect to #CDNpoli, telling the truth & reporting the facts doesn't put #CDNmedia "in a very difficult spot"

Grow a pair, in the name of #PressFreedom, @josh_wingrove

Any reporter who is scared of partisans & crafts the record to suit them doesn't belong in the news biz
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Of note, Canada sent a contingent to train Turkish journalists how to report political news as part of a #NATO measure (circa 2006-2010)

But #CDNpoli isn't supporting those very reporters in matters of #PressFreedom, now that it's a #HumanRights fiasco in an allied country
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
#HowICopeIn5Words

Floyd, Zeppelin, Mayer, Triumph, & Alt-J
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text: #CDNpoli #USpoli #UKpoli #EUpol #AUSpol #Khashoggi #HumanRights #PressFreedom #GeneralDynamicsLandSystemsCanada #LAVs
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text: 2/2 He was part of an alt-right contingent that declared civil war on Canada & any 'liberal' apparatus like the CBC. Lib Party lawyers had to get involved due to including Bob Rae in the threats, but the suspect wasn't charged & only asked not to shoot anyone. And that was 2011
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text: 1/2 When I reported 2011 election for CBC, a Tory aide posted several videos & blogs about shooting me & Bob Rae at event I was covering. He further stalked me & threatened to sit on my neighbour's roof with a Remmington 700. Cops said he was allowed if he didn't pull the trigger
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Most baffling about right-wing attack on #immigrants is they're naturally inclined to identify with Republican ideologies, due to harsh & punitive religious & justice systems they were raised by

For the left-wing it's helpful #GOP & #CPC haven't figured this out #USpoli #CDNpoli
author: MsAmyMacPherson

text:
Beto O'Rourke, the OG hacker, legit #USpoli #1337 #InfoSec

It's a huge gamble to let that kitteh out of the bag, but Millennials now outnumber Baby Boomers

I'm impressed
author: MsAmyMacPherson
